fields.fieldTitle: What are you selling / offering / giving away? (Name of it)

fieldHint.hint1: "I am selling / offering / giving away _____."

fields.fieldTitle: What is the "thing" people are buying / signing up for?

fieldHint.hint1: "People are buying /signing up for a ______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: subscription, membership, free report, video, course, coaching, product, purchase, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the main keyword phrase related to the product/service?

fieldHint.hint1: "We're all about helping you get the best results with your ______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: sales copy; ebook marketing; physical fitness; firearms maintenance; marriage; child's health; etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the name of the person sending the emails?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Russell Brunson, Jim Edwards, Dave Woodward, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the title of the person sending the emails?

fieldHint.hint1: "I am the ______."
Ex: Co-creator, Owner, Author, Founder, Manager, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the focus of the event in 2-3 words?

fieldHint.hint1: "You can access / download your purchase at _______."

fields.fieldTitle: What's the "one big thing" your product / service does for them?

fieldHint.hint1: "This is all about helping you to ______." (VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: create amazing sales copy, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What's the big PAYOFF of that "one thing" above?

fieldHint.hint1: "With this you can _____." (Starts with a VERB)
Ex: build your business fast; etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What's the big PAIN you help them avoid?

fieldHint.hint1: "We help you get results so you can AVOID / never have to be SCARED of ____." (VERB ending in "ING".)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: wasting time creating sales copy that doesn't convert; etc

fields.fieldTitle: What email address(es) should they whitelist?

fieldHint.hint1: "You should whitelist the following email(s) _____."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: jimedwards.do-not-reply@ebookfire.com; support@clickfunnels.com; all emails from FunnelScripts.com; etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is your Facebook link? (URL)

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: https://www.facebook.com/funnelscripts/; https://www.facebook.com/thenetreporter/; https://www.facebook.com/groups/ClickFunnels/; etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is your Twitter link? (URL)

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: https://twitter.com/realjimedwards; https://twitter.com/clickfunnels; etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What's the FIRST THING they should do right after buy / sign up?

fieldHint.hint1: "Before you do anything else, MAKE SURE to ______."(VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: (Ex: watch the quick start video; etc.)

fields.fieldTitle: Where should they go for your support desk? (Email/URL)

fieldHint.hint1: "To contact our support desk, please use ____."

fields.fieldTitle: What is the single most important thing they should do first?

fieldHint.hint1: "The single most important thing you can do right now is _____."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: go through and use the headline wizards to give all of your sales funnels, posts and any other pages you have a lot more punch; etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Why should they do this single most important thing (above)?

fieldHint.hint1: "You should do this because ______."

fieldHint.hint2: *Take as much room as you need to explain WHY they should do this now and any other details that matter.

fields.fieldTitle: What Epiphany Bridge/Origin Story is behind the product/service?

fieldHint.hint1: Share the story behind this product or service. (Take as much room as you need)

fieldHint.hint2: **** NOTE: Try using the "Epiphany Bridge Script" or the "Origin Story Script" in Funnel Scripts to help you create an amazing background story here

fields.fieldTitle: What is the coolest bonus they get with this product / service?

fieldHint.hint1: "Here's the amazing bonus we've got for you, it's called ______."

fields.fieldTitle: What is the BIG PAYOFF of this bonus? (Short)

fieldHint.hint1: "Grab this bonus right now because it will immediately help you ______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: sell more, no matter what you sell; etc.

fields.fieldTitle: How does this bonus help them?

fieldHint.hint1: "This incredible bonus will help you _____."
*Take as much room as you need to explain the big payoff of this bonus.

fields.fieldTitle: Where do they access this bonus? (URL)

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: https://successetc.clickfunnels.com/membership-area443111/3f0e373c7fa; etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Share a case study of your product/service in action.

fieldHint.hint1: The case study can be from you, a customer, a subscriber, etc. (Take as much room as you need.)

fieldHint.hint2: **** NOTE: Try using the "Case Study Script V2.0" in Funnel Scripts to help you get Cast Studies from your customers / subscriber

fields.fieldTitle: What is a speed "hack" with your product / service?

fieldHint.hint1: Share a "hack" that helps people get results FASTER with your product / service.

fieldHint.hint2: Take as much room as you need and focus on sharing a "hack" that speeds up their results

fields.fieldTitle: What is an effort "hack" with your product / service?

fieldHint.hint1: Share a "hack" that helps people get results EASIER with your product / service.

fieldHint.hint2: Take as much room as you need and focus on sharing a "hack" that makes their life EASIER

fields.fieldTitle: Take as much room as you need and focus on sharing a "hack" that makes their life EASIER

fieldHint.hint1: "Take a peek at these..."

fieldHint.hint2: Share existing content and links from your blog, social media, website, archives, etc. that they'll think is cool

fields.fieldTitle: Where / how can they give you feedback?

fieldHint.hint1: "Here's how you can give us feedback..."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: reply to this email; go to this URL: www.replytojim.com; etc.
